repositories.author: mudler
repositories.name: LocalAI
repositories.description: 🤖 The free, Open Source alternative to OpenAI, Claude and others. Self-hosted and local-first. Drop-in replacement for OpenAI, running on consumer-grade hardware. No GPU required. Runs gguf, transformers, diffusers and many more models architectures. Features: Generate Text, Audio, Video, Images, Voice Cloning, Distributed, P2P inference

repositories.author: go-gorm
repositories.name: gorm
repositories.description: The fantastic ORM library for Golang, aims to be developer friendly

repositories.author: go-gitea
repositories.name: gitea
repositories.description: Git with a cup of tea! Painless self-hosted all-in-one software development service, including Git hosting, code review, team collaboration, package registry and CI/CD

repositories.author: ehang-io
repositories.name: nps
repositories.description: 一款轻量级、高性能、功能强大的内网穿透代理服务器。支持tcp、udp、socks5、http等几乎所有流量转发，可用来访问内网网站、本地支付接口调试、ssh访问、远程桌面，内网dns解析、内网socks5代理等等……，并带有功能强大的web管理端。a lightweight, high-performance, powerful intranet penetration proxy server, with a powerful web management terminal.

repositories.author: kopia
repositories.name: kopia
repositories.description: Cross-platform backup tool for Windows, macOS & Linux with fast, incremental backups, client-side end-to-end encryption, compression and data deduplication. CLI and GUI included.

repositories.author: hashicorp
repositories.name: hcl

repositories.name: BillionMail

repositories.author: psviderski
repositories.name: uncloud
repositories.description: A lightweight tool for deploying and managing containerised applications across a network of Docker hosts. Bridging the gap between Docker and Kubernetes ✨

repositories.author: gruntwork-io
repositories.name: terragrunt
repositories.description: Terragrunt is a flexible orchestration tool that allows Infrastructure as Code written in OpenTofu/Terraform to scale.

repositories.author: krillinai
repositories.name: KlicStudio
repositories.description: A video translation and dubbing tool powered by LLMs, offering professional-grade translations and one-click full-process deployment. It can generate content optimized for platforms like YouTube，TikTok, and Shorts. 基于AI大模型的视频翻译和配音工具，专业级翻译，一键部署全流程，可以生成适配抖音，小红书，哔哩哔哩，视频号，TikTok，Youtube Shorts等形态的内容

repositories.author: putyy
repositories.name: res-downloader
repositories.description: 视频号、小程序、抖音、快手、小红书、直播流、m3u8、酷狗、QQ音乐等常见网络资源下载!

repositories.author: samber
repositories.name: lo
repositories.description: 💥 A Lodash-style Go library based on Go 1.18+ Generics (map, filter, contains, find...)

repositories.author: seaweedfs
repositories.name: seaweedfs
repositories.description: SeaweedFS is a fast distributed storage system for blobs, objects, files, and data lake, for billions of files! Blob store has O(1) disk seek, cloud tiering. Filer supports Cloud Drive, cross-DC active-active replication, Kubernetes, POSIX FUSE mount, S3 API, S3 Gateway, Hadoop, WebDAV, encryption, Erasure Coding.
